products.title: Silver Birch Shadow Roman Blind
products.description: Silver birch, a beautiful floral pattern available in 3 varieties of natural colours. This floral roman blind is made up of grey and yellow tones that combine to make a truly beautiful finishperfect for any room. Product id: db-rom0852 fabric colour: shadow material: 100% cotton lining: light filtering poly/cotton blended lining headrail: durable white headrail with top or face fix brackets. Control type: smooth chain operation - great for a durable, even finish energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - increase to er3 (high) by adding thermal lining light filtering: yes silver birch shadow roman blind in grey/yellow/multicoloured.

products.description: Fresco shadow made to measure roman blind fresco shadow made to measure roman blind.

products.title: Birdsong, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a gentle off-white canvas and an artistic flourish of naturally inspired shades, birdsong shadow is the epitome of style meets substance. The shades of grey flow effortlessly into one another to create a timeless look that will never grow old. Match birdsong shadow with some simple country touches like a light beige rug on a wooden floor and a hessian canvas on the wall to create the homely atmosphere you'll never want to leave.

products.title: Silver Birch, Shadow - Roman Blind
products.description: With a light crisp canvas acting as the foundation for a subtle variation of greys and browns, silver birch shadow is the design that you have been searching for. The way in which the colours make their own way across the fabric reminds the eye of the free-flowing beauty of watercolour masterpieces. When you want to work shadow into your dcor it pays to keep things simple. Find a matching scatter cushion cover or throw for the end of the bed and keep the rest of your dcor neutral.

products.title: Fresco Shadow
products.description: Min width: 350mm max width: 1340mm (with join 2500mm) min drop: 400mm max drop: 2500mm fabric composition: 100% cotton guarantee: 12 months controls: sidewinder control. Fabric lining: fully lined as standard, blackout and interlining available. Fixings: fixing brackets included. Headrail: robust aluminium headrail, 40mm wide x 40mm deep. Finish: fabric attached to headrail with velcro. Buy made to measure fresco shadow deluxe roman blinds from soeasy blinds.
